header.title: Your Ears: A Practical Lesson for all who suffer from Impaired Hearing.
authors: Founder of the Science of Mentalphysics

central_thesis: Impaired hearing, often rooted in physical and spiritual disharmony, can be alleviated and healed through a systematic, holistic approach. This system integrates physical purification (diet and exercise), vital energy manipulation (Mentalphysics breathing), targeted ear exercises, and paramountly, spiritual healing through deep meditation, visualization, and resolute affirmations based on the inherent 'Divine Intelligence' within each individual.

structure_content.summary: This section introduces the premise that deafness can be alleviated and that one's thoughts and beliefs influence reality. It emphasizes that 'BREATH IS LIFE' and presents the system as an optional but highly beneficial path to regaining hearing, citing a testimonial of success through Mentalphysics.

structure_content.chapter_title: Part One: Cleansing the Body: Constipation
structure_content.summary: This part asserts that constipation is 'THE ROOT OF ALL DISEASE' and must be eliminated for effective healing. It outlines a two-week dietary and lifestyle regime focusing on natural foods, specific juices, high water intake, and regular exercise to naturally cleanse the body and establish bowel regularity without cathartics.

This section explains the foundational role of breath in Mentalphysics, stating that 'Breath is the fount of all human power' and connects breathing to the utilization of 'ether' for physical and mental health. It emphasizes that correct deep breathing is essential for overall well-being, including clarity of mind and morale, as a prerequisite for specialized healing.

structure_content.chapter_title: Part Three: Special Exercises for the Ears
structure_content.summary: This section details specific physical and energetic exercises for the ears, coupled with a mental injunction to believe in and imagine perfect hearing. Practices include nightly warm olive oil application, a breath-retention exercise visualizing air expulsion through the ears, and full-body postures designed to circulate energy. It also advises regular self-testing of hearing progress using sound sources.

structure_content.chapter_title: Part Four: Spiritual Healing of the Ears
structure_content.summary: Considered the 'most important phase,' this section focuses on meditation, visualization, and affirmations. It guides the practitioner to access the 'Divine Intelligence' within, visualize perfect ear anatomy (eustachian tube open, sensitive ear drum), and repeatedly affirm perfect hearing and wholeness. It includes specific meditation affirmations for different aspects of healing and a general principle of aligning with the 'Creative Spirit'.

key_concepts.definition: A 'Science' or 'Faultless Philosophy of Life' founded by Edwin J. Dingle, revealing the inherent power within individuals to shape their lives, including physical health, through conscious thought, breathing, and spiritual alignment.

The core principle that breathing is directly linked to thought, vitality, and existence. Correct breathing allows access to 'ether,' a powerful atmospheric force, which is essential for physical and mental health, and for enabling the body's natural healing processes.

An inherent higher consciousness or 'Creator' within each individual, capable of healing and knowing all. Accessing this intelligence through meditation and affirmation is central to the spiritual healing of deafness and other conditions, as it is 'listening to the sounds of the universe through my ears'.

The practice of resolutely stating and deeply feeling desired outcomes (e.g., 'my hearing is PERFECT,' 'I am Whole') and mentally picturing perfect physical states (e.g., a baby's ear, an open eustachian tube). This is believed to manifest physical reality, aligning with the principle 'As a man thinketh in his heart, so is he'.

An invisible, powerful, all-pervasive force in the atmospheric air, analogous to the medium through which sound and light travel. It is considered the source of human power, accessed and utilized through correct breathing for physical and spiritual benefit.

A foundational belief within the system that physical impurity, particularly chronic constipation, underlies various ailments, including ear trouble. Therefore, natural and thorough bodily cleansing is a mandatory first step in any healing process.

practical_system.description: The system is a comprehensive, four-part program for self-healing of impaired hearing, emphasizing a holistic approach that treats the physical, mental, and spiritual aspects of the individual. It progresses from basic physical purification to advanced spiritual attunement, requiring daily commitment, discipline, and unwavering belief in the efficacy of the methods and the inherent healing power within.
tools: Ear syringe (optional, for warm water flushing)
Kitchen pot and kettle with string (for self-testing hearing progress)
rituals: First Week's Cleansing Regime: Daily intake of unsulphured figs (soaked), hot lemon water (gulped quickly on rising), 10 glasses of pure/distilled water (not with meals), deep abdominal massage, ensuring regular bowel movements, grapefruit/orange/tomato juice (12oz), very light meals of above-ground vegetables, daily walks.

Second Week's Cleansing Regime: Continuation of first week's practices, but with raw apples (chewed thoroughly) for breakfast, and a small salad with baked potato (with skin, no bread) for lunch. Fruits for dinner (apples, pears, figs, peaches, persimmons, apricots, plums).
Nightly Ear Cleaning: Applying slightly warmed olive oil drops into each ear, followed by cotton plugs, before sleep.

First Exercise (Morning): Sit straight, heels touching, spine erect. Close left nostril, breathe in through right; retain. Breathe in through left nostril; retain. Close both nostrils; imagine blowing air out through ears with a slight jerky movement.

Second Exercise (Sitting): Sit straight, hands on knees. Take a small breath. Drop head forward, pulling it down between knees, bending and arching the spine, retaining breath for as long as comfortable. Gently exhale.

Third Exercise (Standing): Stand feet apart, take a small breath. Drop head, feeling heaviness, swing arms forward while going downward, pulling on head until it's near knees (knees bent, not stiff). Retain breath, feel 'flow of life into head'. Gradually straighten up, gently exhale.

AUM Chanting: Close ears with forefingers, audibly exclaim 'AUM' (prolonged O-O-M-M), directing the vibration internally to the ears, increasing loudness and duration. Begin with 3 times nightly, progressing to 7.

Meditation Preparation: Sit in a comfortable chair or 'Tailor Fashion' on the floor with spine straight. Take 3-4 long breaths through nostrils, exhale to become limp, withdrawing all tenseness. Place hands on knees. Observe thoughts without engagement. After a time, audibly and firmly declare: 'Peace be still... I am still... I AM AT PEACE... I am at Peace. Peace Peace Peace.'

Meditation Affirmations (repeated resolutely and reverently, then sit in stillness): 'The Creative Spirit did not creat deafness... I refuse to believe that I am deaf... deafness has no power over me... my hearing is PERFECT... MY HEARING IS PERFECT.'; 'My hearing is PERFECT... I hear perfectly all the sounds about me... My hearing is PERFECT... MY HEARING IS PERFECT.'; 'Deafness is not a law of life... Man is not subject to deafness... I am not subject to deafness-it has no power over me... NOW I AM FREE, FREE, FREE.'; 'I am Whole... I am PERFECT... I am STRONG... I am POWERFUL... I am LOVING... I am HARMONIOUS... I am RICH... I am YOUNG... I am HAPPY... I give THANKS... I give THANKS.'
Constant Affirmation: During all waking moments, 'FEEL the Truth that 'THE CREATOR IS WITHIN ME, LISTENING TO THE SOUNDS OF THE UNIVERSE THROUGH MY EARS'.'

critical_analysis.relevance: This work is a clear example of early 20th-century New Thought and Mind-cure movements, integrating spiritual philosophy with practical health regimens. Its emphasis on mind-body connection, vital energy ('ether'), and affirmative prayer/meditation aligns it with esoteric traditions like Hermeticism (as above, so below), certain branches of Qabalah (power of divine speech/thought), and Eastern practices (pranayama, visualization). While not explicitly grimoire magic, its operative focus on self-transformation through structured practices, belief, and the manipulation of subtle energies for a specific outcome (healing) positions it firmly within the broader occult sphere of applied metaphysics and personal esotericism. The rejection of traditional medical diagnosis in favor of spiritual solutions is characteristic of many 'faith healing' and self-help spiritual systems of its era.
critical_analysis.target_audience: The primary target audience is individuals suffering from impaired hearing who are open to or actively seeking alternative, holistic, or spiritual methods of healing. It also appeals to students of Mentalphysics and those interested in self-empowerment through mind-body connection and spiritual discipline, particularly those disillusioned with conventional medicine or seeking a deeper, metaphysical understanding of health.
